FIx LAst Table!

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

df <- read_csv("Regression/Regression_Results.csv")
```

```{r}
mypaste <- function(x, y, z) {
              paste0(x, " (", y,", ", z, ") ")
}
```

```{r}
x = df$Beta
y = df$b_lower
z = df$b_upper
Bet <- as.data.frame(mypaste(x, y, z))

x = df$Intercept
y = df$I_lower
z = df$I_upper
Int <- as.data.frame(mypaste(x, y, z))

x = df$R2
y = df$R2_lower
z = df$R2_upper
r2 <- as.data.frame(mypaste(x, y, z))

x = df$sigma
y = df$s_lower
z = df$s_upper 
sig <- as.data.frame(mypaste(x, y, z))

nam <- df$name
type <- df$type

df2 <- bind_cols(nam, type, Bet, Int, sig, r2) %>% write_csv("Regression/Reg_Table.csv")
```
